page.title: 09GAMES WE PLAY IN 1985.
page.content:
{KICK-BALL FLY.}
To play kick-ball fly you need a football and a lot of people.One person sits on the ball and chooses another person to kick the ball he also chooses a person to be 'it'.The kicker kicks the ball down the street and the person that is 'it' runs after the ball to bring it back. He or she has to return backwards while the other people go and hide.When the person that is 'it' gets back he looks for the others.If one person gets to the ball before the person that is 'it' he can kick it and the person who is 'it' must get the ball again and look for the others.When everyone is caught the first person to be caught is 'it' and the game begins again.
